Description: 
------------ 
Roxio Creator 2010 is a set of tools that lets you create, edit, delete all your digital files, photos, music, video, etc, is one of the best selling digital tools as used at present its new features are amazing, creating Total DVD, CD, design your own frames, digital content and professional riding. 

New look: The Creator home page is the launching pad for all your video projects, photos, audio and recording. Thanks to the easy and intuitive design Creator will move from one project to another easily and smoothly. 

Copying: Easily copy CDs, DVDs and Blu-ray data, audio, photos or video. Copy a movie from a 9 GB DVD to a recordable DVD standard 4.7 GB. Create custom DVD compilations. Convert video files for playback on the device you want. * Does not rip or copy encrypted disks or content or copy protected. 

Music: No matter what kind of music do you like it! Thanks to Creator 2010 is easy to rip songs from CDs, digitize and clean LPs and tapes and record audio from internet or any music that sounds in your PC. Create custom mixes and compilations for every occasion.
